Name: OCILogs
Author: Eli Forbes - v-eliforbes@microsoft.com
Description: The Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) data connector provides the capability to ingest OCI Logs from [OCI Stream](https://docs.oracle.com/iaas/Content/Streaming/Concepts/streamingoverview.htm) into Azure Sentinel using the [OCI Streaming REST API](https://docs.oracle.com/iaas/api/#/streaming/streaming/20180418).
